message.name: Open_Angle
message.comment: Open with specified angle.

message.name: CloseLoad
message.comment: Close gripper with max load specified.

message.name: Center
message.comment: Center both servos given the current opening angle

message.name: Close
message.comment: Close gripper.

message.name: Open
message.comment: Open gripper.

message.name: RelGotoZ
message.comment: Move the gripper to a desired Z Position relative to the current z position
message.field: New z relative to the current z, in mm.

message.name: StopLeft
message.comment: Stop motion of left servo immediately.

message.name: StopRight
message.comment: Stop motion of right immediately.

message.name: Stop
message.comment: Stop motion immediately.

message.name: Flush
message.comment: Flush the message queue. This implicitly stops running motions.

message.name: Calibrate
message.comment: Calibrate left/right unit.

message.name: Park
message.comment: Move arm into save parking position.

message.name: Goto
message.comment: Goto desired left/right values.

message.name: TimedGoto
message.comment: Goto desired left/right values in a specified time. The PTU may adapt the velocities such that two positions are reached at the same time.
message.field: Time in seconds when to reach the final position.

message.name: SetServo
message.comment: Enable or disable motors/servos.

message.name: SetEnabled
message.comment: Enable or disable motors/servos.

message.name: SetVelocity
message.comment: Set maximum velocity for left/right unit.

message.name: SetMargin
message.comment: Set margins left/right unit motions.

message.name: SetTorque
message.comment: Set max servo's torque in a range of 0 - 1.

message.name: Slap
message.comment: Open the gripper and release the servo given in the 'side' field. Side is either "LEFT" or "RIGHT"
